body:
Hey guys,

So have you ever broken a bone?

Or pulled a muscle or something cray-cray? xD


I haven't but my brother did from falling off the top of a zipline :o

Post ur bone breaking sweg below :DD

replies.body: no but i thought i did when i squished my finger against a table... (i was like 6 k? idk wut was happening) so anyways my ring finger became double jointed, then a few years later all my fingers (besides my right thumb) became double jointed oh, both my knees too :P so i tried to make my right thumb double jointed and i ended up kinda just dislocating it... but now it's double jointed too yey ^-^

replies.body: I play hockey and I haven't broken a bone or been hurt badly... But the most recent would be yesterday when I was playing soccer for P.E and I stood on the ball and fell backwards, hard. Opened my eyes with people looking down at me saying "..... are you all right?" Yep I blacked out for apparntly 5 - 10 seconds, had a really bad headache for a while after.

replies.body: My arm almost got broken before when i'm still a second grader cause my classmate bumped at me and then my arm landed in a chair's supporter that i can't move it. It's a good thing my leg isn't broken that i only got a sprain.
